cause.description:
I think that at 12 years old a person knows what is right or wrong.They should pay the price for their crime.To get 3 years for murder is rediculous.They should be getting life as an adult.YOU DO THE CRIME YOU DO THE TIME EVEN IF IT WAS ONE OF MINE I WOULD STILL LOVE THEM BUT I WOULD FEEL THE SAME WAY. Lets stop all the drive bys and stabbings .Just lets stop all the crime with getting rid of the young offenders act PLEASE.
1. YOUNG OFFENDES ACT MUST NOT EXIST
cause.name: young offenders act
